cause.description:
Yo!
Anyone can donate anything to this, to go into my movie fund. I know how to make movies, so give me money. Anything over 10 cents is awesome. You can have a role in the movie too if you donate. And you get a free pogo when you come on set.
1. $$$
cause.mission: Make a sweet kick ass movie, a comedy, that will be fucking priceless.
cause.name: Making A Movie!
